amendment.description: Amendment added $12.5 million for the Environmental Intelligence Applications Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment adding $12.5 million for the Environmental Intelligence and Applications Program, formerly known as the Environmental Task Force, while cutting $12.5 million from the bill's $25 million authorization for declassification activities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weldon (PA) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
